price: Na tukamwachia (sifa njema) kwa walio kuja baadaye.
footnotes: Na tukamwachilia Nuhu kutajwa kwa wema na watu walio kuja baada yake wakimdhukuru mpaka Siku ya Kiyama.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
